detail_desc: Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Boxy jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a large collar, dropped shoulders, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish and fringes. Size 55x210 cm.
Block-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the sides.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Plastic yoyo with a hologram motif.
Sandals in imitation leather. Adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastening around the ankle and a grosgrain loop at the back. Moulded insoles in imitation suede and fluted soles.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, wide sides with a drawstring and full coverage at the back.

Trousers in woven fabric made from a wool blend with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend. Relaxed fit with a low-cut back that has decorative gathers around the edge, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Sandals with covered block heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, boxy, hooded top in printed, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Stand-up collar with a drawstring, low dropped shoulders with seams, and long, wide dolman sleeves with raw, roll edges and slits at the cuffs. Wide ribbing at the hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a flare to the hem.
A pair of twisted hoop earrings made from recycled zinc. Diameter approx. 3.8 cm.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Wide waist belt in suede with a round, covered buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless body in mesh with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Nightshirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front, long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Soft, knitted tube scarf with a brushed finish. Width 55 cm, circumference 150 cm.

Set with a cardigan and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Cardigan with press-studs down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with frilled cuffs.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Metal chain bracelet with a claw clasp. Length 19 cm.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and super-skinny legs.
Linen jersey top in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
High-waisted shorts in cotton twill with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and open back pockets.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Blouse in an airy linen and viscose weave with a slightly wider neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dresses in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Leggings in flock-print sweatshirt fabric with a glittery elastic waistband.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft organic cotton. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a collar, shirt front, sewn-on bow tie, button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neckline and print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved base layer top in a soft wool blend with elastication at the neckline and cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

Dungarees in superstretch denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Chest pocket, back pockets, fake front pockets and a fake fly. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M.

Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with inset hole embroidery, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring and tasselled ties at the waist. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal front pockets and welt back pockets. Slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Gently flared top in a lightweight weave with narrow shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the top.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Elasticated seam at the hips and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Imitation suede trenchcoat with a small stand-up collar, shoulder tabs and draped lapels. Loose yoke front and back, a detachable tie belt and side pockets. Unlined..
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 50x50 cm.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
Bag in imitation leather and imitation suede with a wide, longer handle at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Depth approx. 10 cm. Width approx. 26 cm. Height approx. 34 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Imitation suede sandals with a scalloped foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and decorative flounces with overlocked edges down the shoulder seams.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
Cropped, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves and an overlocked edge around the top, sleeves and hem.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Bow tie and matching handkerchief in a patterned cotton weave. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and a fastener at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Round sunglasses with sidepieces in metal and plastic and slim frames trimmed with pearly plastic beads. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Santa costume in fleece with long sleeves and a matching Santa hat.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
